SELECT p.*, m.* FROM (SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY pr.hp_kind ORDER BY pr.hp_like DESC, pr.hp_hit DESC) ranking, pr.hp_kind, pr.hp_num, pr.hp_title, pr.hp_content, pr.hp_like, pr.hp_hit, pr.hp_scrap, pr.m_id, NVL(pr.hpre_cnt,0) hpre_cnt FROM (SELECT pb.*, r.hpre_cnt FROM plus_board pb LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT hp_num, COUNT(*) hpre_cnt FROM plus_reply GROUP BY hp_num)r ON pb.hp_num = r.hp_num)pr)p LEFT OUTER JOIN member_detail m ON p.m_id = m.m_id
WHERE p.ranking <= 5
ORDER BY p.hp_kind ASC, p.ranking ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT b.*, r.hpre_cnt FROM plus_board b LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT hp_num, COUNT(*) hpre_cnt FROM plus_reply GROUP BY hp_num)r ON b.hp_num = r.hp_num WHERE b.hp_kind = #{hp_kind} ORDER BY b.hp_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM plus_reply START WITH hpre_depth = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR hpre_num = hpre_parent ORDER SIBLINGS BY hpre_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
